commandDescription: report sandbox org creation status and authenticate to org
sandboxnameFlagDescription: name of the sandbox org to check status for
sandboxnameFlagLongDescription: The name of the sandbox org whose creation status you want to check.
waitFlagDescription: number of minutes to wait while polling for status
waitFlagLongDescription: The number of minutes to wait for the org to be ready while polling for its creation status.
setdefaultusernameFlagDescription: set the created org as the default username
setdefaultusernameFlagLongDescription: Sets the created org as the default username.
setaliasFlagLongDescription: An alias for the created org.
